title: No popup menu on Java editor ruler in Photon
description: When opening a Java editor and right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, a popup menu should appear to allow the user to add breakpoints or marks. However, this menu does not appear.
OB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected behavior is that a popup menu appears to allow the user to add breakpoints or marks.
EB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected behavior is that a popup menu appears to allow the user to add breakpoints or marks, but this menu does not appear.
SR: 1) Open Eclipse Photon. 2) Open a Java editor. 3) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. Confirm that no popup menu appears to add breakpoints or marks.
